query:
UPDATE loan_offers
        SET
            loan_amount_max = GREATEST(0, loan_amount_max - $1),
            status = CASE 
                WHEN GREATEST(0, loan_amount_max - $1) < loan_amount_min THEN 'Unavailable'::loan_offer_status
                ELSE status
            END,
            updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        WHERE id = $2
